title: "Seeking Contestants for Rotary's Annual Youth Speech Contest"
excerpt: "King Annual Youth Speech Contest in Pleasanton and Dublin. The contest, which recognizes the importance of public speaking for leadership development, will provide ninth-to-twelfth grade students a chance win cash and earn community recognition by presenting an original five-minute speech on the theme of \"Serve to Change Lives."
